entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is waiting outside the Leaky Cauldron.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A person who is waiting with Harry and gives an estimate of how long he will be.

entities.name: rubeus hagrid
entities.description: The Hogwarts gamekeeper who arrives to pick up Harry and is wearing a long beaverskin coat.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: A bird that has been released into the open air and is happy to be back outside.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts who has decided that Hagrid will pick up Harry instead of sending Aurors.

relationships.description: Harry is waiting for Mr Weasley to give him an estimate of how long he will be.
Hagrid picks up Harry from outside the Leaky Cauldron.
Harry is related to Buckbeak as the bird has been released by him.
Dumbledore has approved Hagrid to pick up Harry instead of sending Aurors.
